::Battera::

Her body jerked back as she dreamed. She fell back and layed on the 
cave floor instead of sitting as she was earlier.  She almost tore 
the connection cable out from her head, but didn't.

She cried and looked at the demonic version of Vulois.  He was 
holding her up in the air by her throat. He laughed evilly,"If you 
think that this is pain, you haven't experienced what real pain is 
yet." He slammed her down onto the ground and continued to kick her 
in the stomach and ribs.  Then he walked away.  He walked over to a 
small cabinet.  He pulled out a small remote and then walked back to 
her.  He pushes a button on the remote and a huge tank of water 
appeared infront of them. It had glass walls, she could see the water 
inside the tank.  She wondered if he was going to try to drown her.  
He pushed another button and 7 sharkticons appeared in the tank. Her 
widened in fear at the site of the sharkticons swiming around inside 
the tank.  She slowly, on her hands and knees, moved away from the 
tank. But her leash only let her move a few feet back.
Vulois laughed and smiled at the tank. "Just as you let me to die at 
the hands of Hell Beast, it's your turn to die."  He turned and 
walked over to her.  She was shaking from the damage that was already 
done to her.  Her wings were all torn and ragged, her back was marked 
and leaking from the whipping.  Her body was bruised and her ribs 
were cracked.  She cringed as he approached her.  He crabbed her by 
the collar and lifted her feet off the ground. "Now my sweet Battera, 
you will become Sharkticon fodder. And I shall enjoy watching them 
feast on your worthless, cowardly body."  He walked over to the 
tank.  Still holding her by the collar, he walked up the flight of 
stairs that led to the top of the tank.  He held her over the water 
as the sharkticons circled the water, just a few feet below. She 
cried and begged him not to do this, "Please,  Vulois, can't you find 
it in your spark to forgive me? You did once, please...please...don't 
let me die. I served under you as an ambassador for your ammbassy to 
bring about peace. How can you do this now, killing me like this?" If 
she was going to die, she wanted to know why.
He laughed and grinned evilly. "I have enjoyed watching you squirm 
like a worm on a hook. That is what you are, a worm. You left me to 
die. For that, you shall die as well."
She pleaded, "Please,.....I beg you, don't put me drop me in the 
tank. Please." tears were running down her cheeks and she begged for 
her life.
He smiled,"Alright, I won't drop you into the tank."  He started to 
pull his arm back in. Then he spun and threw her into the tank.  She 
hit the water with a loud splash.  Vulois laughed maniacally.  "See? 
I didn't drop you, I threw you. HAHAHAAHHAA!"  She sputtered and 
splashed around on the surface of the water.  The large dorsal fins 
of the sharkticons circling around her.  She twisted around, trying 
to keep an eye on them as they swamm around her, but there were too 
many of them.
Vulois walked back down the stairs and watched the scene from below 
the waters surface on the outside of the tank.  He looked up and 
could see her legs kicking in the water. He laughed and waited for 
the sharkicons to start thier attack. 
She screamed out from the tank,"HELP ME! SOMEONE HELP ME!"

She muttered in her sleep,barely audiable,"help me."
Her arms moved and her head jerked back and forth.
